thread.title: Thomas Weinachr
thread.title_full: Scientifics Online reviewed by Thomas Weinachr

author: Thomas Weinachr
title: Thomas Weinachr
text: This is an excellent project to build and play with. It really captivated my 9 year old son and made him focus on many details in putting it together, which took about 5 hours. The design is excellent and allows the builder to appreciate how it works in detail. Overall I was very impressed with it and would recommend it to parents who are interested in teaching their children and enjoy working with them on it.
